comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Clicked on Title Header to sort task list, then printed using "current view".  


Actual results:

Printed Task list is not sorted as displayed (retains physical order?)


Expected results:

Printed Task list should sorted in the same order as displayed.
comments.author: uds0@juno.com
